title: Hostel Admission Notice for First-Year UG/Dual Degree Students

notice.summary: All first-year UG and Dual Degree students who wish to stay in the hostel must deposit Hostel Fee and Mess Charges through the MIS online payment mode after physical verification.

details.login_info: Login ID and password are available in the Provisional Admission letter.

hostel_fee.program: UG (B.Tech and dual degrees BSMS and BTMT)
hostel_fee.priority: Girls from outside Tripura get priority

instructions: Pay the one-time hostel initial fee (₹7000) via MIS account.
Pay the hostel fee (₹6200) via MIS account.
Proceed to room allotment in MIS.
Submit receipts and filled hostel application form at hostel office.
No guest room facility available; make private arrangements.
Hostel reporting time: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
International Guest House booking possible via email: chiefwardennita@gmail.com.
No seat limitations in boys' hostels; all interested students may apply.

payment_procedure: Initial Hostel Fee (₹7000) via MIS → Online Payment → SBI EPAY → Common Payment Interface → Select Receipt Type → Hostel Initial Fee → Pay
Hostel Fee (₹6200) via MIS → Online Payment → SBI EPAY → Common Payment Interface → Select Receipt Type → Hostel Fee → Pay
Allot hostel room via MIS → Login → Hostel → Transaction → Automatic Room Allotment → Allot Room

rules_and_regulations: Maintain calmness and quietness in hostel and mess.
Ragging is strictly prohibited; report immediately if victim.
Keep room/floor/corridor/toilet clean; follow COVID-19 protocols.
Only personal laptops, mobile phones, and power banks allowed; other electrical appliances prohibited.
Fighting is punishable.
Cooking and keeping pets are not allowed.
Motor vehicle use prohibited inside campus and hostel.
No smoking, tobacco, or alcohol consumption in hostel/campus.
No possession of lethal weapons.
Do not remove mess utensils from the mess.
Unauthorized accommodation of friends/visitors prohibited.
Lady guardians allowed to visit Gargi Hostel boarders at specified times.
Do not paste on walls/furniture.
Room interchanging/altering not allowed without approval.
Hostel administration may shift students to maintain discipline.
Do not write name/roll number on room door.
Celebrations/parties in hostel prohibited.
Playing loud music or disturbing others prohibited.
Cannot be absent at night without permission; special cases require MIS approval.
Mess leave limited to 8 days/month with approval.
Entering opposite gender hostels prohibited.
Roof of hostel/mess usage prohibited.
Boys outside hostel 10:00 PM to 4:30 AM restricted; girls as per notification.
Backlog exam students can stay during vacation with prior approval.
Late entry register maintained; warnings issued for repeated late entries.
Damage to hostel property is occupant's liability.
Misuse of water/electricity/facilities will be disciplined.
Hostel administration not responsible for loss of valuables.
Joining hostel mess mandatory; individual cooking not permitted.
Mess rules to be followed strictly.
Rooms must be available for inspection, maintenance, or disinfecting.
Proper care of furniture and fittings required.
Excursion/picnic leave requires prior permission.
Student undertakes the hostel rules willingly.
